newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL palm oil ends with small gains ahead of USDA.
newsitem.headline: KL palm oil ends with small gains ahead of USDA.

text.p: PALM OIL FUTURES PALM OIL PHYSICALS

PALM OIL FUTURES - Ended with small gains after trading in a tight range, with some further demand in products helping late sentiment. Players were cautiuous ahead of USDA report, scheduled tonight. Sept futures contract seen trading between the 1,110 and 1,150 levels.
PALM OIL PHYSICALS - Saw some interest among products, with traders sidelined before the release of official June crop data.

"Players are still having mixed views over market direction," a trader said. Some traders said the slight gains were a reflection of technical adjustment after sharp losses, while others said the bearish trend was still intact.
The September futures contract is trying to test the 1,110 ringgit barrier before reaching the psychological level of 1,100.
At the close, the contract finished the day two ringgit higher at 1,128 ringgit ($450.48) a tonne after trading between 1,120 and 1,134.
Traders said next week's trend also depended largely on the outcome of Malaysia's Palm Oil Registration and Licensing Authority (PORLA) key June crop data.
"A build in stock levels and rising output was also cited as the main bearish factors," a trader said, adding that despite current low attractive prices, demand remain sluggish.
Turnover on the futures market was 1,926 lots.
Among physicals, July (south) crude palm oil saw offers at 1,167.50 ringgit against bids at 1,162.50 after trading at 1,165.
July (central) saw offers at 1,160 ringgit versus 1,155.
Aug (south) was offered at 1,162.50 against bids of 1,167.50 after trading at 1,165. Aug (central) was offered at 1,160 against bids of 1,155.

In refined products, July RBD palm oil was offered at $492.50 a tonne FOB Malaysia, Aug/Sept at $490 and Oct/Nov/Dec at $490. July RBD palm olein saw offers at $530, Aug/Sept at $527.50, and Oct/Nov/Dec at $525. Aug was traded at $525 and $527.50, and Oct/Nov/Dec at $525. July RBD palm stearin was offered at $375 and July/Aug/Sept palm fatty acid distillat at $290. - Tan Lee Lee -603- 275-6834 ($1-2.5040)
